title: strange font
content:
I would be very thankfull to anyone who can help me with this one. I tried online font recognision, but no result. I consider it is not a full font and thought the 'e' looks almost italic, while the rest is so rigid.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021184152im_/http:/typophile.com/files/waddenhaven_6624.jpg)
author: elzosmid

comments.content: Could it be the Novel Sans Condensed Bold and alterated, using the 'd' to make an different 'a' and the italic 'e' to make a straight 'e'?
